item.description:
For the 6th year in a row the Boston Red Sox will proudly host the 6th Annual Futures at Fenway minor league doubleheader on Saturday, August 18, at 1pm.

Minor league baseball's stars of tomorrow will once again be playing minor league games at Fenway Park. Game One will feature the Lowell Spinners taking on the Hudson Valley Renegades at 1:05 p.m. The second game will showcase the AAA Pawtucket Red Sox playing the Buffalo Bisons.

The afternoon of baseball will allow fans to enjoy moderate ticket prices, discounted concessions and a fun-filled family atmosphere including autograph sessions and on-field promotions.

Ticket prices start at $5.00. Single Admission ticket will be honored for both games.

Tickets are available to the general public on www.redsox.com after Saturday, March 17, at 10am.

Please RSVP when you purchase your tickets. If any one would like to buy a small block of tickets for members to attend please do and notify the Organizers.
item.name: 6th Annual Futures at Fenway Park Minor League Doubleheader
